question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/sharded_aggregator_service.rs] [Function: aggregate_and_update_total_supply()] [Scope safety] The executor_thread_pool.scope() at line 217 ensures threads complete before continuing - but can panic in one thread during parallel execution leave other threads running with corrupted state?
